PreferenceScreen.android:title: WHAT IS ICSOURCERY
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: A ROM Built using google source. We try to make something Different and fun. We offer many original features, as well as utilize some of the great works of others. Please read the live change log!
Development Lead and Manager of Team Sourcery , Rom Development
CO-Rom Development, Tools app Guru!
Official Sourcery Boot animations Designer!, ICSourcery Wallpaper Designer, Public Relations, Support technician, Webpage and Forum Development.
IRC maintainer, Support Technician, Kernel Tester and maintainer.
Lead ICSourcery Themer!
Theme consultant , Theme development, Rom Tester! Unfortunately Xkape is busy with life but will return!
Theme consultant , Theme development, Rom Tester, Battery mod Maker!
